channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Problem no where near fixed, 19th March
item.description:
You’ve said the issue is fixed yet you changed one paving slab. Literally next to it is broken uneven slabs and it’s the same all around whaddon

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Tamar Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: As per previous reports water is flooding from around manhole down Farm Lane to the A46 where is flooding., 19th March
item.description:
Reported in February and reported as cleared. Same location. Here is a precise what3words address, made of 3 random words. Every 3 metre square in the world has its own unique what3words address. ///gobbles.trouble.reminds https://w3w.co/gobbles.trouble.reminds
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farm Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Bad Planning, 19th March
item.description:
Who is the idiot who decided to do this work this week making children late for school. It's the school holidays next week, but obviously you do not care about children's education. Perhaps the person planning this work should have gone to school more often?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Mini-roundabout needed, 19th March
item.description:
It is very difficult to exit Badgeworth Lane here, not to mention Greenway Lane. A mini-roundabout would slow down traffic entering and exiting Shurdington along the A46 too. Traffic may even slow down enough to allow people to exit the hotel safely. A bend in the A46 doesn't help here. Just generally slowing traffic down here would be good.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenway Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Misleading sign on roundabout, 19th March
item.description:
The northwest bound approach to the PE2 Way/Tewkesbury Road roundabout doesn’t clearly inform motorists which lanes can be used for turning right. Normal rules would imply only the right-most but this isn’t true here, where it is actually the two right-most. This results in vehicles ending up in the wrong lane on and after the roundabout. The right turn lanes should be clearly indicated. As you can see from the pictures, they are completely missing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
